scheduleMeetingForm.configuteTeamsMeetingTooltip: Please enable Microsoft Teams support in admin settings first!
scheduleMeetingForm.commentFieldPlaceholder: Add a comment, dial-in info will be appended automatically.
scheduleMeetingForm.availabilityStatusFreeButSomeUnknown: The availability of some attendees is unknown

commentVisibility.choose: Choose if a comment should be added to the issue
commentVisibility.tooltipExplanation: Choose if a comment should be added

dateTimePickerForm.occurInPastTooltip: This meeting would occur in the past

meetingSuggestion.noMeetingSuggestionsPlaceholder: Select participants to see meeting suggestions.

scheduleMeetingDialogFooter.sendMeetingTooltip: Send an Outlook meeting request to all attendees and - if selected - add an issue comment with the meeting details

adminSettingsScreen.learnMoreFlagDescription: Welcome to {{ appName }}. Go to any issue and log in with your Microsoft 365 account to get started!
adminSettingsScreen.scheduleMeetingDescription: Schedule meetings from any issue using the button on top.
adminSettingsScreen.inValidLicenseText: You don't have a valid license or it has expired. If you'd like to continue using our app, please get a valid license!
adminSettingsScreen.microsoftLoginChangeWarning: Are you sure you want to change the way how to authenticate with Microsoft? This may impacts if users are able to login.
adminSettingsScreen.removeCustomAppRegsitrationWarning: Are you sure you want to remove the custom app registration? The app will fallback to the Yasoon standard app and it may impacts if users are able to login.
adminSettingsScreen.customADAppDescription: This setting allows you to use a custom, self-hosted AzureAD enterprise app registration.
adminSettingsScreen.tenantIdFieldPlaceholder: Enter the tenant ID of the registered app
adminSettingsScreen.visibilitySettingsDescription: Use the settings below to enable or disable the app for each project by default. Each setting can be overridden in the project settings.
adminSettingsScreen.sentrySettingsDescription_html: Help us to improve the app by sending automatic product feedback and error logs via <1>Sentry</1>. This is important information for our development team. Thank you!
adminSettingsScreen.templateSettingsDescription: Customize the meeting request that is sent via Outlook. Use all available fields of the issue using the {{{issue.field}}} syntax (limited set of HTML is supported).
adminSettingsScreen.templateSavedFlagDescription: The templates have been saved successfully.
adminSettingsScreen.sectionMoved: This page has been moved to its own navigation section. You can now configure your templates in a more comfortable and flexible way.

officeLoginScreen.heading: Welcome to {{ appName }}
officeLoginScreen.description: Looks like you're using the app for the very first time. Please log in with your Microsoft 365 account to get started!

projectSettingScreen.heading: Outlook Meetings for Jira
projectSettingScreen.visibilityDescription: Visibility settings only affect the current project.
projectSettingScreen.availabilityDescription_html: Availability settings control the appearance of the Outlook availability panel.
projectSettingScreen.participantsDescription_html:
Configure which user issue fields are relevant when searching for available meeting times.
Valid email adresses in text or label fields will be identified.
projectSettingScreen.defaultAvailabilitySettingsLabel: Include all fields of a issue with users.
projectSettingScreen.suggestionsNumberDescription: Configure the number of suggested meeting slots.
projectSettingScreen.timePickerStepsDescription: Choose how many steps should be displayed in the time picker.
projectSettingScreen.channelIdDescription: Configure which Teams channel should host the meetings. The channel will be notified when the meeting starts and chats will appear in the channel.
projectSettingScreen.additionalDescription: Use additional configurations for custom developments only in consultation with the support team.
projectSettingScreen.additionalInvalidNoArray: Additional config must be an array type.

scheduleMeetingDialog.meetingScheduledDescription: The meeting has been scheduled and all participants have received their invite.

upcomingMeetings.noMeetingsDescription: Looks like you have not scheduled any meeting yet - create a new one below 📆

helperLabels.noAvailabilityFor7Days: Not available for the next 7 days.

templatePicker.noTemplatesGlobalAdminTooltip: No templates have been configured yet. You can create new templates in the global app settings or project settings.
templatePicker.noTemplatesProjectAdminTooltip: No templates have been configured yet. You can create new templates for your project in the project settings.
